name: com.pinplage
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.reset: cordova platform rm android && cordova platform add android
scripts.test: cd .. && npm run generate && cd src-cordova/ && cordova run android
scripts.standby: rm -rf plugins node_modules platforms && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clear --force && npm i && cordova prepare

author: Apache Cordova Team
